document.full_text: portugal and greece talked up the benefits of lisbon's decision to accept a multi-billion euro bailout from the european union and imf on wednesday, but the outlook for both countries and ireland remains highly uncertain.
document.title: euro zone takes third debt crisis patient into care
lines_and_colors: portugal and greece talked up the benefits of lisbon's decision to accept a multi-billion euro bailout from the european union and imf on wednesday, but the outlook for both countries and ireland remains highly uncertain.
